nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Welcome to the Rusty Anchor! What can I get ya?

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Information, eh? Well, I hear things. What do you want to know?

choices.text: Have you seen anything unusual lately?

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Safe travels then, stranger. The roads can be dangerous at night.

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Unusual? Hmm... There's an old chest in the corner. Been there for years. Rumor says there's something inside.

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Small town, but we've got what you need. Shop's across the square, library down the street. And watch out for that forest path...

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: The forest? There's an old hermit who lives out there. Strange fellow, but harmless. Some say he knows ancient secrets.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Welcome to my humble shop! Browse as you like.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: A bit of everything! Tools, supplies, rope, lanterns... and the occasional curiosity from travelers.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Rope? I might have some in the back. If you help me with a little delivery problem, I could give you some.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Lanterns? Yes, but they're not cheap. You'd also need matches to light them. Check the cellar of the tavern - I heard there's supplies down there.

nodes.speaker: Drunk Patron
nodes.text: *hic* Hey there, friend! Buy me a drink and I'll tell ya a secret...

choices.text: You look like you've had enough.

nodes.speaker: Drunk Patron
nodes.text: *hic* There's treasure, I tell ya! Hidden in a cave past the forest. I've got half a map... somewhere...

nodes.speaker: Drunk Patron
nodes.text: *burp* Never enough! Life's too short to be sober, friend!

nodes.speaker: Drunk Patron
nodes.text: If you find me some more ale, maybe I can remember where I put it. Deal?
... You seek something. I can see it in your eyes.
Who I am matters not. What matters is what you will become. Seek the hermit in the forest. He has answers.
I want nothing. But I offer guidance. The library holds secrets that will change everything.

nodes.speaker: Guard
nodes.text: Halt! State your business in town.

nodes.speaker: Guard
nodes.text: A traveler, eh? Well, keep out of trouble and we'll get along fine. The tavern's that way if you need a drink.

nodes.speaker: Guard
nodes.text: Adventure? Ha! Try the forest if you've got a death wish. Or ask around - there's always someone needing help.

nodes.speaker: Guard
nodes.text: Hmph. Rude one, aren't ya? Just don't cause any problems.

nodes.speaker: Librarian
nodes.text: Welcome to our humble library. Knowledge is the greatest treasure.

choices.text: I'm looking for information about this town.
Do you have any ancient books?

nodes.speaker: Librarian
nodes.text: This town has a long history. Founded centuries ago, it guards secrets older than the kingdom itself.

nodes.speaker: Librarian
nodes.text: Ancient books? I have many! But there's one I've been searching for - the Book of Shadows. It's said to be hidden somewhere in town.

nodes.speaker: Librarian
nodes.text: There are caves to the east, beyond the forest. Some say they hold treasures. Others say they hold something far more dangerous.

nodes.speaker: Librarian
nodes.text: If you find it, bring it to me. I'll reward you handsomely with information that could change your fate.

nodes.speaker: Hermit
nodes.text: Ah, a visitor! It's been... years? Decades? Time flows strangely here.

choices.text: What do you know about the cave?

nodes.speaker: Hermit
nodes.text: Old Grumpy still remembers me? Heh. Yes, I know many things. The mushrooms here... they show visions.

nodes.speaker: Hermit
nodes.text: The forest is alive, you know. It watches. It listens. Treat it with respect and it will guide you.

nodes.speaker: Hermit
nodes.text: The cave? *trembles* Dark things lurk there. But also great treasure. You'll need light - not just any light. The crystals within glow only for the worthy.

nodes.speaker: Hermit
nodes.text: Bring me a strange mushroom and I'll brew you a potion. It might help you see what others cannot.

nodes.speaker: Cat
nodes.text: *Meow*

nodes.speaker: Cat
nodes.text: *The cat stares at you with knowing eyes, then walks away mysteriously*

nodes.speaker: Cat
nodes.text: *The cat hisses and disappears into the shadows*
